name: Headphone On, World Off
description:
Class is over, and you can finally listen to music on your headphones. But, for some weird reason, everyone at school don't want you to listen to your music, they want to talk and chat! People these days... pff.

So, avoid talking to people and get to the school's exit before the music ends!


---
made for the #LOWREZJAM 2016
the challenge was to make a game on a 64x64 resolution
https://itch.io/jam/lowrezjam2016
